to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Slackware 11 aliases, anyone?
body:
Well, he can put them into the system-wide file which is used to set
up defaults for all users, if he does not want to mess with them in
just his home directory, or if he has any aliases he uses for both his
unpriviliged account and as root.  



Hope this helps. 
-- 
Spie Smith: C.S.F.C.
Computer Scientist For CHRIST
